participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, loves exploring new places and experiences.
participant_1.background: I worked 3 jobs at the same time for more than 5 years. I like to go to the movies. My favorite car is the ford mustang. I walk more than 2 miles a day.

participant_2.name: Yuki Tanaka
participant_2.personality: Passionate and creative, enjoys art and teaching, and loves animals.
participant_2.background: I m still single at the age of 35. I teach both japanese and drawing classes. My dog s name is wonwon. I still have a thick accent so words like hippopotamus are difficult. I came from japan to teach high school over 10 years ago.

content.text: Hello, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
Hello, I'm participant_2. I'm from Japan and I came to the US over 10 years ago to teach high school.
Oh, that's interesting. Do you like living in the US?
I do, but it's definitely different than Japan.
I can imagine. What do you like most about the US?
I love the freedom here. I can do whatever I want and no one will tell me no.
That's true, we have a lot of freedom here.
I also love the food here. There's so much variety and it's all so good.
Yes, the food here is great.
What's your favorite thing to do in the US?
I love going to the movies. There are so many great movies to see and the theaters here are so nice.
I love the movies too! I go to the movies all the time.
My favorite movie is "The Shawshank Redemption." It's such a great movie.
I've heard good things about that movie. I'll have to check it out.
